metadata.title: CVE-2020-5529 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HtmlUnit prior to 2.37.0 contains code execution vulnerabilities. HtmlUnitinitializes Rhino engine improperly, hence a malicious JavScript code canexecute arbitrary Java code on the application. Moreover, when embedded inAndroid application, Android-specific initialization of Rhino engine isdone in an improper way, hence a malicious JavaScript code can executearbitrary Java code on the application.

criterions.comment: htmlunit package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
